attributes.action: implore NHS Greater Glasgow & Clyde to abandon plans to charge for parking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NHSGGC has declared its intention to introduce charges for staff, patients and visitors who park at hospitals.  Staff have been told that they can expect no more than a 2% wage increase this coming year yet parking charges will be, for many, greater than this.  Thus staff will actually be about 5% poorer due to inflation.  NHS staff deserve better treatment than this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
